name: XWUI Avatar Component
description: Avatar component for displaying user profile images with fallback to initials. Supports various sizes, shapes (circle/square), and status indicators (online, offline, away, busy).

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

status.description: Status indicator to display on the avatar

bordered.description: Whether to show a border around the avatar

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the avatar

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

src.description: Image source URL for the avatar

alt.description: Alternative text for the avatar image

name.description: Name used to generate initials fallback

fallback.description: Custom fallback text to display when image is not available
